title: TCS digital software and solutions group introduces ‘Customer Intelligence and Insights’ for retail banks
text: #Banking TCS digital software and solutions group introduces ‘Customer Intelligence and Insights’ for retail banks A recent TCS Global Trend Study, finds that the most important business process improvement is the ability to tailor products around a single user point of view. Devina Sengupta | 16 September 2015, 4:38 PM IST Share MUMBAI: Tata Consultancy Services , IT services, consulting and business solutions organisation, announced that its Digital Software and Solutions (DS&S) group has launched a new TCS 'Customer Insights and Intelligence' (CI&I) software solution for retail banks.A recent TCS Global Trend Study, finds that the most important business process improvement for financial institutions is the ability to tailor products and services around a single user point of view. As consumer preferences in banking rapidly evolve, financial institutions are racing to catch up with trends by increasing innovation investments in IoT, mobile, digital, and social technologies, which are large disruptors to the way people chose to do their banking today.According to the company statement, the CI&I solution is pre-integrated and modular software designed specifically for the retail banking industry to accelerate the transition from a product-focused organization to a customer-centric enterprise. The solution captures and analyzes structured, unstructured, high volume, and high velocity data to create a single view of the customer and provides actionable intelligence about behaviors across channel and organisational silos."Most banks have an urgent key digital imperative to understand their customers more deeply to address expanding expectations and deliver a personalized end user experience across a multitude of financial offerings and banking channels," said Seeta Hariharan, general manager and Group head of TCS' DS&S group in the statement.
